short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you're interested in finding out which Shopify theme a shop is using and the latest version of that theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the theme behind any Shopify store with ease!

The Shopify Theme Info extension allows you to quickly find out which Shopify theme a store is using and its latest version. Perfect for developers, designers, and store owners, this extension simplifies the process of identifying themes, helping you stay updated with the latest trends in Shopify design.

Key Features:
Instant Theme Identification: Effortlessly uncover the theme name and version used by any Shopify store.
Latest Version Info: Access the latest available version of the identified theme directly from the theme's official page.
User-Friendly Interface: Designed with a clean, intuitive interface that makes it easy to navigate and find the information you need.
One-Click Reload: Refresh the information seamlessly with the reload button.
Whether youâ€™re looking to get inspiration for your next project or need to troubleshoot theme-related issues, Shopify Theme Info is your go-to tool for Shopify theme insights.
